Application Description: NIST requires strict access control policies including multi-factor authentication and role-based access control to protect sensitive systems.
Failure Scenario: Access granted to unauthorized personnel leads to data breach and loss of classified information.
Corrective Application: Implement RBAC, enforce MFA, and conduct periodic access reviews.

Application Description: COBIT 5 emphasizes a structured change process to reduce risk, including stakeholder approval, testing, and documentation.
Failure Scenario: Unapproved changes lead to unexpected system downtime and compliance violations.
Corrective Application: Establish formal change advisory boards and standardized change workflows.

Application Description: Assign data stewards to ensure data ownership, quality, and accountability across business units.
Failure Scenario: Lack of ownership causes data inconsistencies and inaccurate reporting.
Corrective Application: Define data domains, assign stewards, and implement stewardship policies.

Application Description: Mandates logging of system access and monitoring to support incident detection and response.
Failure Scenario: Lack of logs impairs forensic investigations after a cyberattack.
Corrective Application: Implement centralized logging with log integrity controls and retention policies.

Application Description: Establishes a Safety Management System (SMS) for identifying, analyzing, and mitigating operational risks in aviation.
Failure Scenario: Operational hazard goes unmitigated, resulting in a near-miss aviation incident.
Corrective Application: Maintain an active SMS with proactive hazard identification and mitigation plans.

Application Description: Tracks IT assets and configurations through a Configuration Management Database (CMDB).
Failure Scenario: Inaccurate configuration data results in deployment failures.
Corrective Application: Use discovery tools and audits to keep the CMDB accurate and current.

Application Description: Outlines responsibilities for ethical use of personal and enterprise data within governance structures.
Failure Scenario: Improper use of personal data results in regulatory fines and loss of public trust.
Corrective Application: Implement data ethics policy, conduct ethical risk assessments, and provide staff training.

Application Description: Requires separation of duties in financial operations to prevent fraud and errors.
Failure Scenario: A single employee can initiate and approve transactions, increasing risk of fraud.
Corrective Application: Separate conflicting roles and enforce dual approval for sensitive actions.

Application Description: Outlines IT security roles and required training for FAA personnel to protect systems.
Failure Scenario: Employees fail to detect phishing emails due to lack of security awareness.
Corrective Application: Implement mandatory annual cybersecurity training for all FAA personnel.

Application Description: Ensures IT investments align with business strategy and deliver measurable value.
Failure Scenario: IT projects fail to support business outcomes, resulting in wasted spend.
Corrective Application: Use governance scorecards and KPI tracking to measure IT contribution to business goals.
